data.name: Sample - Fortinet FortiNDR Cloud - 1.0.0
data.description: Sample playbooks for "Fortinet FortiNDR Cloud" connector. If you are planning to use any of the sample playbooks in your environment, ensure that you clone those playbooks and move them to a different collection, since the sample playbook collection gets deleted during connector upgrade and delete.

workflows.name: Get Detection Rule Indicators
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of all indicators from FortiNDR cloud based on the rule UUID and other input parameters you have specified.

arguments.title: Fortinet FortiNDR Cloud: Get Detection Rule Indicators

workflows.name: Get Detections List
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of all detections from FortiNDR cloud based on the input parameters you have specified.

arguments.title: Fortinet FortiNDR Cloud: Get Detections List

workflows.name: Resolve Detection
workflows.description: Resolve a details for specific detection from FortiNDR cloud based on the detection UUID, resolution, and other input parameters you have specified.

arguments.title: Fortinet FortiNDR Cloud: Resolve Detection

workflows.name: Get Telemetry Bandwidth
workflows.description: Retrieves details for network telemetry from FortiNDR cloud based on the input parameters you have specified.

arguments.title: Fortinet FortiNDR Cloud: Get Telemetry Bandwidth

workflows.name: > Fortinet FortiNDR Cloud > Fetch Detections by Rules
workflows.description: Fetch all detections by rules from FortiNDR Cloud.

arguments.title: Fortinet FortiNDR Cloud: Fetch Detections by Rules

workflows.name: Get Sensors List
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of all sensors or specific sensor from FortiNDR cloud based on the input parameters that you have specified.

arguments.title: Fortinet FortiNDR Cloud: Get Sensors List

workflows.name: Get Entity Tracking
workflows.description: Retrieves a summary information about an IP address, MAC address, or Host name from FortiNDR cloud based on the entity type, entity value, input parameters you have specified.

arguments.title: Fortinet FortiNDR Cloud: Get Entity Tracking

workflows.name: > Fortinet FortiNDR Cloud > Create Detections
workflows.description: Create all detections in FortiSOAR Alert module.

arguments.title: Fortinet FortiNDR Cloud: > Create Detections

workflows.name: Get Detection Rules List
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of all the detection rules from FortiNDR cloud based on the input parameters you have specified.

arguments.title: Fortinet FortiNDR Cloud: Get Detection Rules List

workflows.name: Fortinet FortiNDR Cloud > Fetch Detections
workflows.description: Fetches all detection from FortiNDR Cloud based on the input parameters you have specified.

step_variables._configuration_schema:
[
  {
    "title": "Pull Detections from Last X Minutes",
    "name": "Pull_Sample_Events_in_Past_X_Minutes",
    "type": "text",
    "tooltip": "Fetch detections from last X minutes. e.g 10",
    "required": true,
    "editable": true,
    "visible": true,
    "value": 10
  },
  {
    "title": "Status",
    "required": false,
    "editable": true,
    "visible": true,
    "type": "multiselect",
    "name": "status",
    "tooltip": "Specify the status of the detection based on which you want to retrieve detections from FortiNDR cloud. Possible values are Active or Resolved. By default, this option is set as Active",
    "options": [
      "Active",
      "Resolved"
    ]
  },
  {
    "title": "Severity",
    "required": false,
    "editable": true,
    "visible": true,
    "type": "multiselect",
    "name": "severity",
    "description": "Specify the severity based on which you want to retrieve detection rules from FortiNDR cloud. Possible values are Low, Moderate, or High",
    "options": [
      "Low",
      "Moderate",
      "High"
    ],
    "tooltip": "List of severities to filter by: Low, Moderate, High."
  },
  {
    "title": "Confidence",
    "required": false,
    "editable": true,
    "visible": true,
    "type": "multiselect",
    "name": "confidence",
    "description": "Specify the confidence based on which you want to retrieve detection rules from FortiNDR cloud. Possible values are Low, Moderate, or High",
    "options": [
      "Low",
      "Moderate",
      "High"
    ],
    "tooltip": "List of confidences to filter by: Low, Moderate, High."
  },
  {
    "title": "Muted",
    "required": false,
    "editable": true,
    "visible": true,
    "type": "checkbox",
    "name": "muted",
    "description": "Filter detections by whether or not the detection is muted. By default, this option is set as false",
    "value": false,
    "tooltip": "Filter detections by whether or not the detection is muted. By default, this option is set as false"
  },
  {
    "title": "Sort By",
    "tooltip": "Name of the field on which you want to sort the result (detections). Possible values are First Seen, Last Seen, Status, Device IP, or Indicator Count. By default, this option is set as First Seen.",
    "required": false,
    "editable": true,
    "visible": true,
    "type": "select",
    "name": "sort_by",
    "options": [
      "First Seen",
      "Last Seen",
      "Status",
      "Device IP",
      "Indicator Count"
    ],
    "value": "First Seen"
  },
  {
    "title": "Number of Detections to Fetch",
    "required": false,
    "editable": true,
    "visible": true,
    "type": "integer",
    "value": 1000,
    "name": "limit",
    "tooltip": "Note: If field is not provided ,then it pull only 100 detections."
  }
]

routes.name: Get Macro Value -> Set Time Configuration
Set Time Configuration -> Fetch Detection Rules
Create Detections -> Update Last Detection Pull Time
Is data only for mapping -> Return Sample Data
routes.label: Yes, For Mapping

routes.name: Fetch Detection Rules -> Fetch Detection by Rules
Is data only for mapping -> Create Detections
routes.label: No, For Ingestion

routes.name: Fetch Detection by Rules -> Is data only for mapping

workflows.name: Get Detection Rule Events List
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of all events for a specific detection rule from FortiNDR cloud based on the rule UUID and other input parameters you have specified.

arguments.title: Fortinet FortiNDR Cloud: Get Detection Rule Events List

routes.name: Start-> Get Detection Rule Events List

workflows.name: Terminate PCAP Task
workflows.description: Stops a specific, currently running PCAP task from FortiNDR cloud based on the task UUID that you have specified.

arguments.title: Fortinet FortiNDR Cloud: Terminate PCAP Task

workflows.name: Get Detection Events
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of all events from FortiNDR cloud based on the detection UUID and other input parameters you have specified.

arguments.title: Fortinet FortiNDR Cloud: Get Detection Events

workflows.name: > Fortinet FortiNDR Cloud > Fetch Detection Rules
workflows.description: Fetch all detection rules from FortiNDR Cloud

arguments.title: Fortinet FortiNDR Cloud: Fetch Detection Rules

workflows.name: Get Devices with Detection
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of all devices from FortiNDR cloud based on the input parameters you have specified.

arguments.title: Fortinet FortiNDR Cloud: Get Devices with Detection

workflows.name: Get PCAP Tasks
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of all the PCAP tasks or a specific PCAP task from FortiNDR cloud based on the input parameters you have specified.

arguments.title: Fortinet FortiNDR Cloud: Get PCAP Tasks

workflows.name: Get Detection Rule Details
workflows.description: Retrieves a specific detection rule information from FortiNDR cloud based on the rule uuid you have specified.

arguments.title: Fortinet FortiNDR Cloud: Get Detection Rule Details

workflows.name: Get Passive DNS Details
workflows.description: Retrieves a passive DNS information about an IP address or domain from FortiNDR cloud based on the IP/Domain and other input parameters you have specified.

arguments.title: Fortinet FortiNDR Cloud: Get Passive DNS Details

workflows.name: Get Telemetry Events
workflows.description: Retrieves details for events telemetry from FortiNDR cloud based on the input parameters you have specified.

arguments.title: Fortinet FortiNDR Cloud: Get Telemetry Events

workflows.name: Download PCAP Task File
workflows.description: Download a specific PCAP task file generated by the specified task from FortiNDR cloud based on the task UUID, and other input parameters you have specified.

arguments.title: Fortinet FortiNDR Cloud: Download PCAP Task File

workflows.name: Get Entity Summary
workflows.description: Retrieves a summary information about an IP address or domain from FortiNDR cloud based on the IP/Domain that you have specified.

arguments.title: Fortinet FortiNDR Cloud: Get Entity Summary

workflows.name: Get Telemetry Packetstats
workflows.description: Retrieves details for packetstats telemetry from FortiNDR cloud based on the input parameters you have specified.

arguments.title: Fortinet FortiNDR Cloud: Get Telemetry Packetstats
